name: heyagent
description: HeyAgent.dev - Get notified when Claude Code needs you

scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m 'Update' && git push
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.pack:test: npm pack && mkdir -p .tmp && cd .tmp && npm init -y && npm install ../heyagent-*.tgz && ./node_modules/.bin/hey --version
scripts.release:patch: npm run check && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run check && npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm run check && npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:beta: npm run check && npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm publish --tag beta && git push --follow-tags

author: HeyAgent Team
